title: I have completed my 2 year diploma in agriculture, what is next? - Quora

response.answer_text: Congratulations! So here are few things you could do. Apply for a job in agriculture inputs company as field executive. You would get good on field experience to deal with farmers and could make relationship with dealer which could be a asset in long run.Enrollment to YCM (Yashvantrao Chavan Mukt Vidyapeeth.) Were you can study for BSC agriculture. As this course is long distance kind of thing you only have to appear for exam and maybe 1 lecture a week.A small course at Agri Clinic Agri Management is recommend. If you are unemployed after 1 years of completing these course, you can apply for a subsidized loan on your submitted agriculture related business plan.After 3–4 years you can decide if you want to continue in agriculture inputs company where you would be on a junior or assistant manager earning appox. 18–25k per month.You can try for civil services as you are now an official graduate.You can start a shop selling agriculture inputs as you have contacts with farmers, farm level working knowledge and experience of agriculture inputs company working.
You can purchase agricultural land with the help of land development bank and start cultivation of food grains and serve the country.Jai Kisan !
